cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.6)

add_custom_command(OUTPUT build COMMAND node-gyp configure WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR})

add_custom_target(Job ALL COMMAND node-gyp build DEPENDS build WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR} SOURCES ProcessChain.cpp ProcessChain.h binding.gyp index.js)
